+Mute.effect: Physical attacks may inflict the Mute ailment

+Paralyze.effect: Physical attacks may inflict the Paralyze ailment

+Poison.effect: Physical attacks may inflict the Poison ailment

+Stone.effect: Physical attacks may inflict the Petrify ailment

Agi.effect: Inflicts light Fire damage on one enemy

Agidyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Fire damage on one enemy

Alter Pain.effect: Team members recover MP relative to the damage taken

Amrita.effect: Cures all ailments on all team members

Anger Hit.effect: Guaranteed critical hit to one enemy, but 50% accuracy

Anti-All.effect: Resists damage from all attacks and ailments except Almighty attacks

Anti-Curse.effect: Resists damage from Curse attacks, reduces chance of suffering from ailments

Anti-Most.effect: Resists damage from all attacks and ailments except for Physical and Almighty attacks

Avenge.effect: High chance of retaliating when struck with a physical attack

Ban Curse.effect: Cancels the first mystic attack during battle

Ban Elec.effect: Cancels the first electric attack during battle

Ban Fire.effect: Cancels the first fire attack during battle

Ban Force.effect: Cancels the first force attack during battle

Ban Ice.effect: Cancels the first ice attack during battle

Ban Phys.effect: Cancels the first physical attack during battle

Barrier.effect: Casts Makarakarn at the start of the battle

Battle Aura.effect: Nullifies damage lower than 50 (including Almighty damage)

Berserk.effect: Inflicts moderate HP-dependant Physical damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Brutal Hit.effect: Inflicts moderate HP-dependant Physical damage on one enemy

Bufu.effect: Inflicts light Ice damage on one enemy

Bufudyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Ice damage on one enemy

Counter.effect: Low chance of retaliating when struck with a physical attack

Death Call.effect: Instantly kills all enemies suffering from Mute or Paralyze ailment

Deathbound.effect: Inflicts heavy HP-dependant Physical damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Desperation.effect: Kills self to inflict Almighty damage to all enemies. The lower the user's HP, the more damage the attack will inflict

Dia.effect: Restores some HP to one team member

Diajama.effect: Moderate chance of inflicting Curse ailment to one enemy

Diarahan.effect: Restores all HP to one team member

Drain.effect: Steals HP and MP from one enemy

Drain Hit.effect: Physical hits restore HP equal to 25% of damage done

Dual Shadow.effect: 25% chance of the character repeating the attack they just performed

Elec Dance.effect: Inflicts moderate Electric damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Endure.effect: Withstand one mortal blow once per battle with 1 HP remaining

Extra One.effect: The character always has an Extra Turn in battle

Fire Dance.effect: Inflicts moderate Fire damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Force Dance.effect: Inflicts moderate Force damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Full Might.effect: Casts Might Call at the start of the battle

Gigajama.effect: High chance of inflicting Seal ailment to one enemy

Grace.effect: Casts Prayer at the start of the battle if any team members are injured

Hassohappa.effect: Inflicts moderate HP-dependant Physical damage on all enemies

Healing.effect: Casts Media at the start of the battle if any team members are injured

Hero Soul.effect: If the leader is targeted by an attack, the equipping demon will take the damage in the leader's place provided its resistance to that attack is equal to or better than that of the leader

Holy Dance.effect: Inflicts moderate Almighty damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Ice Dance.effect: Inflicts moderate Ice damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Judgement.effect: Halves current HP of all enemies

Knight Soul.effect: If the leader will take a mortal blow, the equipping demon will take that blow instead and endure the blow if it would die from it

Leader Soul.effect: If a team member would take a mortal blow, and the damage is less than the leader's current HP, the equipping leader will take the hit instead

Life Aid.effect: 10% max HP is restored at the end of every battle

Life Lift.effect: 30% max HP is restored at the end of every battle

Mabufu.effect: Inflicts light Ice damage on all enemies

Mabufudyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Ice damage on all enemies

Magic Yang.effect: Both sides have their MP costs halved

Magic Yin.effect: Damage from MP skills +50%, MP costs doubled in battle, physical attacks cannot be used

Makajamaon.effect: High chance of inflicting Mute ailment to all enemies

Makarakarn.effect: Reflects one non-Almighty magic attack for each team member

Mana Aid.effect: 10% max MP is restored at the end of every battle

Maragi.effect: Inflicts light Fire damage on all enemies

Maragidyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Fire damage on all enemies

Marksman.effect: Enemy evasion is reduced in battle

Mazan.effect: Inflicts light Force damage on all enemies

Mazandyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Force damage on all enemies

Mazio.effect: Inflicts light Electric damage on all enemies

Maziodyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Electric damage on all enemies

Media.effect: Restores some HP to all team members

Mediarahan.effect: Restores all HP to all team members

Megido.effect: Inflicts moderate Almighty damage on all enemies

Megidolaon.effect: Inflicts heavy Almighty damage on all enemies

Might Call.effect: Guarantees a critical hit for the next Physical attack done by each team member

Mighty Hit.effect: Guaranteed critical hit to one enemy

Mute Eyes.effect: Moderate chance of inflicting Mute ailment to all enemies

Null Curse.effect: Provides immunity to Curse attacks and ailments

Paladin Soul.effect: If the leader will take a mortal blow, the equipping demon will take that blow instead and endure the blow if it would die from it while receiving 50% less damage

Paral Eyes.effect: Moderate chance of inflicting Paralyze ailment to all enemies

Petra Eyes.effect: Moderate chance of inflicting Petrify ailment to all enemies

Pierce.effect: Physical attacks cannot be resisted, nullified, or absorbed

Power Hit.effect: Inflicts heavy Physical damage on one enemy

Prayer.effect: Restores all HP and cures all ailments on all team members

Race-D.effect: Damage taken from an opponent of the same race as the character -50%

Race-O.effect: Damage done to an opponent of the same race as the character +50%

Rage Soul.effect: Doubles physical damage, but only basic attacks can be used

Recarm.effect: Revives one fallen ally with low HP

Retaliate.effect: Moderate chance of retaliating when struck with a physical attack

Revive.effect: Casts Recarm at the start of the battle if there are any fallen team members

Samarecarm.effect: Revives one fallen ally with full HP

Shield All.effect: Blocks one non-Almighty attack for each team member

Taunt.effect: Enemies will target user, but user will receive less damage

Tetrakarn.effect: Reflects one Physical attack for each team member

Victory Cry.effect: Some HP and MP is restored at the end of every battle

Wall.effect: Casts Tetrakarn at the start of the battle

Watchful.effect: Character gains a small additional portion of EXP earned by the main character while not assigned to a team

Weak Kill.effect: Inflicts moderate Physical damage to one enemy with increased power if the target is suffering from an ailment

Zan.effect: Inflicts light Force damage on one enemy

Zandyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Force damage on one enemy

Zio.effect: Inflicts light Electric damage on one enemy

Ziodyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Electric damage on one enemy
